name: SKRegion
desc: The definition of an arbitrary area.

items.name: class func infinite() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a region that defines a region that includes all points.

items.name: init(size: CGSize)
items.desc: Initializes a new region with a rectangular area.

items.name: init(radius: Float)
items.desc: Initializes a new region with a circular area.

items.name: init(path: CGPath)
items.desc: Initializes a new region using a Core Graphics path.

items.name: func inverse() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region that is the mathematical inverse of an existing region.

items.name: func byDifference(from: SKRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region created by subtracting the contents of another region from this region.

items.name: func byIntersection(with: SKRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region created by intersecting the contents of this region with another region.

items.name: func byUnion(with: SKRegion) -> Self
items.desc: Returns a new region created by combining the contents of this region with another region.

items.name: var path: CGPath?
items.desc: Returns a Core Graphics path that defines the region.

items.name: func contains(CGPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a particular point is contained in the region.
